conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with isometric orientation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D geometry and cutaway execution. Wall corners are clean and perspective is solid.

geometric_accuracy.notes: General adjacency is maintained, but significant wall distortions exist around the entrance and kitchen island/wall intersection. The bedroom wall geometry is simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Most furniture (sofas, beds, dining table) is present and correctly located, though the kitchen appliances are partially merged into walls.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity; consistent lighting and materials. Some minor mesh artifacts where walls meet the floor near the entrance.

detected_errors.description: The wall separating the living area and dining area has been converted into a thick fragment/pillar rather than the continuous L-shape in the plan.
Door swing directions and types differ from the 2D plan indicators.

summary: A high-quality 3D render that captures the essence of the floor plan with minor geometric deviations in internal wall placement.
